name: Canto
desc: Can move again after certain actions.

name: Flying
desc: Can fly.

desc: Grants STR +2.

desc: Grants DEF +5.

desc: Grants SPD +5.

desc: Grants SKL +5.

name: Dragonstone
desc: Grants STR +12, SKL +12, DEF +15, RES+20.

name: Poisoned
desc: Inflicts -1 to Def/Res. Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Resist+
desc: Grants additional RES.

name: Stoneskin
desc: Take half damage but inflicts -2 SPD.

name: Stunned
desc: Unit cannot act.

name: Sleep
desc: Unit is asleep.

name: Petrify
desc: Unit is petrified. Cannot avoid enemy attacks and suffers -30 dodge.

name: Rescue
desc: Unit is weighed down with a traveler.

name: Steal
desc: Can steal items from enemies with lower speed. +1 Sight in Fog.

name: Thief's Set
desc: Unit can pick locks, open treasure, steal and see one tile further in the dark.

name: Crit +30
desc: Grants +30 Critical change

name: Crit +15
desc: Grants +15 Critical change

name: Anticrit
desc: Grants immunity to critical hits.

name: Wretched Air
desc: Grants STR +10, SKL +10, DEF +10, RES +10.

name: Demon Light
desc: Grants MAG +10, SKL +10, LCK +10, DEF +10, RES +15.

name: Ravager
desc: Grants STR +15, SKL +15, DEF +15, RES +15.

name: Silence
desc: Unit cannot use magic.

name: Berserk
desc: Unit is confused and can no longer tell friend from foe.

name: Torch
desc: Grants increased sight range in fog of war.

name: Void Curse
desc: No exp gained for attacking this unit.

name: Inspiration
desc: Aura - Grants +1 damage and +1 resist to allies.

name: Inspired
desc: Grants +1 damage and +1 resist.

name: Devil Luck
desc:
Skill gained by equipping the Devil Axe.
Receives damage equal to damage dealt.

name: Eclipse Helper
desc:
In order for enemies to use Eclipse, they must think they're inflicting a negative status or dealing damage.
Eclipse doesn't deal damage normally, so instead it secretly inflicts this status.

name: Mercy
desc: Prevents unit from critting or doubling.

name: Homing Shot
desc: Launches an attack that does 1.5x damage, +100 hit.

name: Star Laser
desc: Attacks up to 3 enemies in a row. Can't Double.

name: Controller of Fate
desc: This unit's presence on the battlefield grants you the ability to utilize the Turnwheel of Fate. However, you know what they say about messing with time.

name: Bloodsucker
desc: Heals 50% of damage dealt.

name: Pivot
desc: Moves to the other side of an ally.

name: Taskmaster
desc: Increases the Hit of all units within 2 tiles by +10.

name: Working Overtime!
desc: +10 Hit

name: Hard Worker
desc: Gives +3-5% to all growths per kill. Growth boosts reset on level up.

name: Natural Talent
desc: Gives +1% Hit/Avoid per level.

name: Head Distraction
desc: Sekibanki's heads fly about, causing all enemies -20 Hit within 3 tiles.

name: Head Distraction
desc: Sekibanki's heads fly about, causing all enemies -20 Hit within 3 tiles.

name: Wolf Fang
desc: Applies "Bleeding" after attack. Unit takes 5 damage per turn and takes 1.2x damage. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts 3 turns.

name: Wolf Fang
desc: Applies "Bleeding" after attack. Unit takes 5 damage per turn and takes 1.2x damage. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts 3 turns.

name: Bleeding
desc: Unit takes 5 damage per turn and takes 1.2x damage. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts 3 turns.

name: Stoneskinned
desc: Unit gains +4 defense for 1 turn after ending their turn.

name: Stoneskinned
desc: +4 Def

name: Magical Might
desc: Changes damage formula to Mag/2 + Res/2.

name: Flood of Frost
desc: Applies -3 Spd on the enemy for 2 turns. Gives Letty +10 Res for 2 turns.

name: Flood of Frost
desc: Applies -3 AS on the enemy for 2 turns.

name: Frozen
desc: Applies -3 Spd on the enemy for 2 turns.

name: Frozen
desc: Applies -5 Spd/-4 Mov on the enemy for 2 turns.

name: Knowledge is Power!
desc: Doubles WExp gained by adjacent allies.

name: Apparitions That Stalk The Night
desc: Covers the battlefield in a very thick fog. Then grants user the "Night Hunter" skill, enhancing their combat aspects. Usable once per map.

name: Apparitions That Stalk The Night
desc: Summons Fog of War onto the battlefield.
components: Global Apparitions That Stalk The Night

name: Night Hunter
desc: +4 Str/Mag/Skl/Spd and +1 Mov but also doubles damage taken from follow up attacks.

name: 1000 Masks: Calm
desc: Restores 20% of Health each turn. Mask will shift at the start of next turn.

name: 1000 Masks: Happiness
desc: Gives +30% Crit, +20% Hit, -20% Avoid, -20% Crit Avoid. Mask will shift at the start of next turn.

name: 1000 Masks: Anger
desc: Grants +4 damage, +4 AS on initiation, -5 HP recoil. Mask will shift at the start of next turn.

name: 1000 Masks: Sadness
desc: Unit gains +4 Def/+4 Res but -4 Str/-2 Mag/-2 Spd. Mask will shift at the start of next turn.

name: 1000 Masks: Hope
desc: All weapons are brave, but cannot double. Mask will shift at the start of next turn.

name: 1000 Masks: Hope?
desc: +3 Dmg, -3 Dmg taken, -15 Avoid/Crit Avoid, Cannot Double. Takes half damage on any strikes after the first hit. Mask will shift at the start of next turn.

name: Shattering Moon
desc: Adds weapon weight to damage.

name: Shattering Moon
desc: Adds weapon weight to damage.

name: Infest
desc: After attack, infests a unit and gives them -3 Mov for 2 turns. Unit can also move after attacking.

name: Sparrow Song
desc: Allows user to refresh an ally.

name: Immortal Red Soul
desc: Locked to 1 Rng. 5 HP battle recoil. +1 Dmg/4 HP lost. Heal HP = Mag each turn. May revive once.

name: Phoenix Crash
desc: After attack, sets user's HP to 50% of their Max HP. Then envelops user with Phoenix Aura.

name: Phoenix Aura
desc: Inflicts Burning onto enemies within 2 tiles. (Burning: Str/2, takes 5 damage at the end of each turn. Lasts 3 turns.)

name: Burning
desc: Str * 0.5, Unit takes 5 Dmg at the end of turn. Lasts for 3 turns.

name: Eye of Bullshit
desc: We can see you smiley :)

name: Searchlight
desc: +4 Fog Vision, -10 Avoid/Crit Avoid to enemies within 2 tiles.

name: Searchlight
desc: +4 Fog Vision, -10 Avoid/Crit Avoid to enemies within 2 tiles.

name: Prism Camouflage
desc: Takes half damage, +10 Avoid when facing light magic. Much less likely to be targeted.

name: Interfering Waves
desc: Allies and enemies alike wielding magic within 3 spaces receive -3 Mag/+3 Res.

name: Quiet!
desc: Allies and enemies alike within 3 spaces receive -3 Mag/+3 Res.

name: Haphazard Smash
desc: +1 DMG for every point of weight above user's Con.

name: Portal Combat
desc: Can counter at any range. Halves damage dealt and -2 AS when unit is defending.

name: Mogu Mogu
desc: Unit can act after using an item.

name: Perfect Freeze
desc: Res% chance to apply -5 AS, -4 Mov on the enemy for 2 turns.

name: The Strongest!
desc: When facing an opponent with a higher Str, +9 Hit, Avoid, Crit, Crit Avoid.

name: Nature Power
desc: Increases crit by Mag/2.

name: Lunatic Red Eyes
desc: Can target any unit regardless of allegiance. Berserks them for 3 turns and gives them -30 Hit/Dodge but also +50 Crit.

name: Lunatic Red Eyes
desc: Can target any unit on the field. Berserks them and gives them -30 Hit/Dodge but also +50 Crit

name: Lunatic Red Eyes
desc: Can target any unit on the field. Berserks them for 3 turns and gives them -30 Hit/Dodge but also +50 Crit

name: Super Luck
desc: +1 Crit per point of Lck. Cannot be crit.

name: Optimism
desc: Aunn restores 20% of her health at the beginning of each turn and gets +5 HP from all sources of healing.

name: Indomitable Spirit
desc: Immune to negative statuses.
